title: YEAR
description: Returns the year component from a Date or Date Time, evaluated in the context user's local time zone.

parameters.name: date/datetime
parameters.description: The date or datetime to extract the year from.

examples:
YEAR(TO_DATETIME("2024-01-01T00:10:00.000Z"))
-- Assume the userâ€™s local time zone is America/New_York (UTC-05:00, standard time)
-- Returns 2023
